website_summaries.verdict: The Beats Studio Wireless delivers thunderous bass and noise cancellation, but these Bluetooth headphones are overpriced compared with the competition.
pros: Powerful audio performance aimed at bass lovers
Includes two cables, one with a three-button remote, for wired, passive listening
cons: Bass and treble are boosted to unnatural levels

website_summaries.verdict: The product that started the celebrity-endorsed headphone craze gets an update, but the Beats Studio is still intended for bass lovers and not for audiophiles.
pros: Delivers powerful audio with deep bass and very crisp highs
Comes with two detachable cables, one with inline remote control
cons: Wildly sculpted sound signature not for purists
Can't be used in passive mode
The familiar design is either a draw or a repellent

customer_reviews.title: Sound choice?
customer_reviews.text: Judging by the reviews listed on here these things are great Sadly the active noise cancellation was actually quite poor and at times amplified outside noise into the ear cups. Rather than getting a nice quiet environment you got an almost digitised louder environment when you put them on before playing music Look great, good build quality, connect to Bluetooth products easily enough - just a shame that their main selling point and feature wasn't up to the hype
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: ... they're the only wireless over ear headphones with a nice round shape that don't make your head look weird
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they're the only wireless over ear headphones with a nice round shape that don't make your head look weird, plus they can be folded up. Sound is fine but the quality of the material is dreadful. I've hardly used them, yet the black finish is already coming off and there are lots and lots of scratches. I don't have long finger nails, I never dropped them, I always carry them inside a soft bag, so the only explanation for this is that it's very cheaply manufactured, something that other reviewers have also commented on.
customer_reviews.author: Arabella

customer_reviews.title: Solid as a rock, cos I came from a rock...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly. Correct item. My last pair of a Beats Solo HD wireless were a present for my 15th, 4 years ago. The plastic was so worn it snapped a few days ago. Worth mentioning both cups still work and it still works wirelessly, just looks a bit ghetto with all my repairs. Had to upgrade and chose beats again based on my experience. Hope these last like my old pair, but they look and sound great. Easy to use. Nice price at 240.
customer_reviews.author: Zach V

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but very limited noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable headphones and but noise cancelling limited to quieter environments. If you attempt to take them outside, near any public space or where there is heightened background noise, the noise cancelling does little to help and can actually become distracting. It’s a shame as these are very well built and comfortable. I had bought these as a second pair to take to the gym and for walks outdoors but sadly they came up well short when compared to my Bose QC35. If you are looking to listen with these indoors in quieter environments they will be fine, but if you want to do more with them I would suggest looking at other models out there.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. James Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: I took 3 months to decide on an upgrade to my Beats solo wireless, which gave me 3.5yrs of good service! Seeing as I use my headphones for gym (up to 5 times per week), I needed form and function from a wireless headphones. Initially, I chose the Parrot Zik 3 - given all it's great features and build quality! Sadly, they looked terrible when I tried them on. There was no way I was wearing them to gym (ever)! Been using the Beats Studios for a week now and I'm well impressed! Build quality has definitely improved, sound quality is great and the active noise cancelling feature is impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Adrien Padayachee

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for a few days so resilience is something I can't comment on although having owned beats headphones on few occasions previously, they almost always end up breaking in some way but to be fair, I have an extensive user, I use headphones literally every single day including to work out but I digress, so far, these headphones are excellent, the quality of sound is fantastic as usual, they look sleek and sexy and they are very comfortable on the ear even after hours of constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Clueazon

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet expectations
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great on these headphones but I found the noise cancelling to be very poor. Minimal noise was cancelled, I could usually still hear people talking while listening to music. And after wearing them for about 30-45 minutes they will start to hurt and be uncomfortable. If I'm honest, there are better headphones out there for the same price as these.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived part missing and the left headphone has no sound, they are obviously fakes! the way the packaging is put together is untidy also. I never normally write a review but I don't want you to waste good money on these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kind of disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Seems fake. First of all beats should come in black box, not white. Second of all, in extras should be 2 aux cables and 1 charging, but there’s only one aux, charging and carabine. There is annoying noise when listening thru bluetooth, I don’t think it should be like that. And one ear cushion was a bit bended, but over all sound quality for 150£ is really good, bass is pretty hard but soft and smooth, so these 2 things kinda compensates cons.
customer_reviews.author: Aidas

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best headphones I have ever purchased. The quality of sound is next to none. I use these virtually every day and for travelling, the hard case included is perfect for this especially. They lived up to my expectations and exceeded them. If you are thinking whether to go for the wired or the wireless versions definitely choose the wireless. They are a lot less restrictive and the length of the you can use while wireless is more than enough. Also a note on the charge time from dead to full charge VERY FAST.
customer_reviews.author: DenisC14

customer_reviews.title: Missing part.
customer_reviews.text: There is a cap missing off the left earphone. The b logo. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last
customer_reviews.text: 2 years 2 months on and adjustable head piece snapped, also cracked on both sides above ear pieces. Cheap plastic turned brittle
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great - Cant go wrong with Beats Audio.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones in true Beats style are excellent. Battery power is amazing and I have never actually have them run out on me. They work on flights even if I am not listening to music, the noise cancelling is excellent. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Good audio and quality but I expected more for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good audio and quality but I expected more for the price. A headphone purchase at this price, you would expect to be wowed.
customer_reviews.author: ALEX WALLACE

customer_reviews.title: Worst headphones ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst pair of headphones I've ever had. The button to start and stop I'd awkward, can't turn the noise cancelling on any more and to top it off they no longer charge after only 4 months of use. Won't ever buy beats again, waste of £230...
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great, when they work.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Headphones but poor quality. First pair broke within less than 30 days due to a electronic fault. The second broke within 90 days due to a mechanical fault. The wired cable needed for making calls really defeats the purpose of having wireless headphones.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my partner...I am assured that these are the t*ts for listening to all kinds of music...

customer_reviews.title: Good earphones crap case
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good, controls are easy to work, they look good, what's not to like. The carry case is really poor, cheap and nasty are the words hat spring to mind. Being ancient I do miss a set of good instructions but that's progress.

customer_reviews.title: It’s broken and I her some noes in Background

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and Style
customer_reviews.text: Has the wired NEW Beats Studios, but as soon as the wireless became available it was an easy choice to sell them and upgrade. Well made, great sound and noise cancelation. Major upgrade from the original v1 Studios. Only negative would be the price, but you get what your pay for in my opinion.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! amazing clarity and bass. Better than the original studio. only downside is that the noise cancelling needs a little getting used to as it creates some kind of suction on your hear drums that can result in a slight headache but once used to it... it no longer becomes a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Michael Akinsanya

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great packaging & prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my daughter. She absolutely loved this as her birthday gift. The colour is quite nice, and the build quality is quite good. Though the sound quality and noise reduction is not upto the Bose QC35, that I use, it's still a good set of headphones. The packaging is quite good and was delivered on time. Connectivity to my daughter's phone (iPhone) was seamless and she pretty much uses on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sri Raghavan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is phenomenal. OK expensive, but you definitely get what you pay for on this.
customer_reviews.author: gingernob

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, great sound but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Wasnt a fan of these and returned them after a week of trying to get used to them. Sound quality is good but the issue for me was mainly comfort. These felt incredibly heavy and after an hour of wear I wanted to take them off as my head became sore. I couldn't accept this as I play games for hours and needed something more comfortable. Loved the style and black gloss finish though!
customer_reviews.author: jk44

customer_reviews.title: HELP
customer_reviews.text: My headphones are faulty, they are crackling very loudly in the left ear even when no music is playing, they are within warranty so I need to know how I go about getting a replacement. It's an intermittent problem that ruins an otherwise PERFECT experience, can't find any details to contact the store, any help would be greatly appreciated
customer_reviews.author: SanguineDream

customer_reviews.title: Broken after a year
customer_reviews.text: Gave it 1 star because I couldn't give it 0. Awful product, wireless feature and the headphone cushion have broken after a YEAR. Paid a weeks wages for this. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clarity
customer_reviews.text: At first my jaw dropped at the price but after hearing them on they are spectacular worth everypenny and delivery was impressive too with the tracking ability for a first time user on amazon its the start of something quite beautifull.

customer_reviews.title: Extremelly recommended

customer_reviews.text: Superb! Fully worth the money. The lovely things is that you get to hear totally new sounds,especially on stuff that is 30+ years old. Brilliant.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound, long distance wireless listening, great sound and comfortable for extended periods of time.

customer_reviews.title: Quality in sound
customer_reviews.text: Expensive is as high as the quality. As a music lover I am really pleased with the overall result. Listening music with this headphones is a completely immersive experience that becomes a wonderful habit. Highly recommended for music producers or lovers.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: too pricey for what it is. Sound could be better

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: Positives: Overall decent headphones. Good sound quality if you can be bothered messing with the EQU settings on whatever device you use to listen to music. Negatives: Although these look great the build quality is terrible, they feel extremely cheap and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable
customer_reviews.text: Love the design but a major flaw is that after 3 months of use the ear cushion was getting easily worn and the stitching failed. I would recommend it ,if you care more about fashion that sound.Sound Quality is not bad but is not worth the demanding price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ***Warning warning Avoid***
customer_reviews.text: I've owned 3 types of beats headphones, eventually, they all break due to wear and tear. After spending £320 on these wireless headphones. I've come to notice a serious manufacturer defect. The inner part of the cushion is sealed together with glue. After 3 months the whole thing started falling apart. Yes it's under warranty, but they'll repair it the same way and it will dismantle again. Right now, I feel robbed and I want my money back!
customer_reviews.author: DaTruth

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase and were definitely originals
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his birthday present!! A great purchase and were definitely originals.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound, if you have the money
customer_reviews.text: + perfect base and excellent sound quality + very comfy on the head/ears +excellent noise cancellation , perfect on the tube -sometimes the Bluetooth resets the connection on iPhone - always has to be charges in order to hear music, wont work with wire and no battery left, - hinges get lose, hard to fold
customer_reviews.author: Tudor Vasile

customer_reviews.title: BEATS
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly in sound quality I have been looking for. You can hear everything with these full over ear headphones. I've been used to in ear ones and was getting sick of them, either falling out or pulling them out with the wires. They are so comfy you hardly notice them there apart from the music blaring in your ears. Excellent for a very wide spectrum of genres.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY. FAULTY FOAM MATERIAL ON EAR.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THEM. sent two pairs back. Same problem. One ears foam compacted and doesnt bounce back over time. Had to spend £330 with apple to get a pair that are 100% straing out of box. One thing the apple box is white while the amazon boxes are black ... No idea what that means. Other than in this case you do get what you pay for (if you follow the ling of dr dre website).
customer_reviews.author: anthony h.

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones, bad seller
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, these headphones are amazing, sound and noise cancelling is perfect. I'm not happy with the fact I've now had two pairs of the exact same pair of beats and the same problem is underlying. I commute to college everyday by bus and when I'm wearing them and the bus goes over a bump in the road the left speaker seems to wobble. I have tried on my friends pair which are exactly the same, the only difference is that his are from apple, and his don't do it. Like I said it's happened twice now. I won't be buying from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Grigg

customer_reviews.title: too expensive for basic sound. i will never buy ...
customer_reviews.text: too expensive for basic sound. i will never buy it again. save money, and go for 1 week holiday in Europe with same amount

customer_reviews.title: Faulty battery
customer_reviews.text: Faulty battery... had to have it replaced on the second week. Stopped charging at 90% and would die in less than 2 hours... didn't get a new one, they fixed it apparently but I'm very apprehensive because the battery dies very quickly (4 hours or so).
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great. There are few flaws: 1. battery doesn't last too long (less then 3hrs) 2. not purely noise cancelling. 3. get disconnected very often with PCs

customer_reviews.title: ... Beats by Dr Dre is unbelievable and I would recommend these to anyone who wants a pair of top ...

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the ear pads is very poor for the price of these supposedly quality headphones. When the headphones are folded for storage the headband crushes and distorts the right ear pad.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Graver

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price tag
customer_reviews.text: These are nice headphones, however the sound you get from them really does not justify the price tag. I'm not bashing Beats, I love the brand and have used their headphones for years - though these particular pair are just weak. I ended up buying the Beats Pro (next one up, highest in their line), and they are so much better! Actually they were even cheaper than this pair which was odd. But for the price, these headphones are really not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I ever bought , great sound quality and noise reduction so all you can hear is your music . Will buy another pair if these stop working 100 % happy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Not good experience
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth failed to work correctly from day one. Gave up and returned. Amazon refunded very prompt
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled.
customer_reviews.text: High end price but not high end cans at all. cannot use noise cancelling and blue tooth simultaneously, hard to connect. my advise is go elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted to Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Just avoid!
customer_reviews.text: I got these headphones 3 days ago marked as new, and yesterday they arrived with the box sealed with the transparent plastic but inside, the card was ripped, the headphones had minor scratches and drop marks, the left side was playing lower then the right side and the power brick and cables with using signs. Not to mention that the Bluetooth was already named as John.beats. I'm giving one star because I can't give zero. Just a bad joke!
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones apart from the buzzing...Try Bose instead ;)
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones but there is one issue. The noise cancellation will drive you insane, it constantly hisses and you can only get rid of it by increasing the volume to ear shattering limits. If you want a better headphone, i returned mine and got the Bose Quietcomfort 35. Great product and no hissing :)
customer_reviews.author: The Floff

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but...
customer_reviews.text: I started suffering from pressure headaches brought on either by bluetooth signals or the actually headset. I never had an issue with my old studios but these ones aren't the best when it comes to comfort. I also feel pressure on both sides of my jaw when i wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Aziz

customer_reviews.title: The Beats Headphones, by Drake
customer_reviews.text: The Beats has made my workout effortless, I'm in a virtual music studio when when wearing my beats headphones, and I feel the intent of the music and effect.If this stuff is durable, then I have an asset that can change my life for good.
customer_reviews.author: Akanma A.

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These are just amazing , easy set up, great sound , long charge ,
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Lawson

product_meta.title: Beats Studio Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - Gloss Black
product_meta.description:
Beats Studio Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - Gloss Black.

BOX CONTAINS
Beats by Dr. Dre Studio Wireless over-ear headphones, RemoteTalk cable, Hard-shell carrying case and Beats by Dr. Dre cleaning cloth
feature_bullets: Built-in mic and controls on the ear cup for calls and music
Pair and play with your Bluetooth device with 30 foot range
Up to 22 hours of battery life enables full featured all day wireless playback
Take hands-free calls with built-in mic
